entries.name: ReadingDirectionAllowed
entries.label: Allow Reading Direction
entries.description: If enabled, allows players to enable reading direction output in their client configs

entries.name: MapMarkingAllowed
entries.label: Allow Map Marking
entries.description: If enabled, allows players to enable automatic map marker creation in their client configs

entries.name: ReadingDirection
entries.label: Reading Direction
entries.description: If enabled and allowed by the server, adds the direction of the reading to the output, in addition to distance / quantity

entries.name: MapMarking
entries.label: Map Marking
entries.description: If enabled and allowed by the server, automatically creates a map marker for long-range distance and quantity samples

entries.name: Simplified
entries.label: Simplified Operation
entries.description: If enabled, only requires 1 sample to output the density readings. Will still consume the equivalent of 3 samples of durability

entries.label: Durability Cost
